properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 12:41PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South
Carolina...

Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Fairfield...Kershaw and
Lancaster Counties

Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting
Calhoun and Richland Counties

North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County


.Runoff along with additional releases from upstream reservoirs will
result in high levels and minor flooding on some area basins through
early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden.
* until further notice, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 14.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 15 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will fluctuate through the daytime Friday.
The river will then rise above flood stage Friday night, and
crest just below 16 feet Saturday evening or Sunday morning.
* At 15 feet...Flooding begins in the Congaree National Park. This
will begin to produce flooding of portions of the lower boardwalk.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.
